test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y desk))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X black))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y desk))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y table)))) )
test.nl: There is a can which is green on the desk. The door of the microwave is closed. Put the red remotecontrol in the microwave. Put a can which is green on the microwave. Pick up a bottle. Put down the black cup. Take out the black remotecontrol from the closet. Put black remotecontrol on the desk. The black bottle must be on the table.
